archimate:Folder.name: 5.2.2 Managed Consolidated Database Services
archimate:Folder.documentation:
Services providing access to and management of relational databases where a separate specialized implementation is not warranted.
The services are based on Oracle Real Application Clusters (RAC). The service includes deployment of production, development, and test databases using resources of the RAC.
TODO: model dependencies to disaster recovery, monitoring and authorization and hardware provisioning service.
